# config-merger Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "configmerger" {
  project_config = "config/{{facts.environment}}/{{facts.region}}/{{facts.project}}"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_config` (String) Project Configuration
